## RenderOptions interface

Options for rendering pixels to the LED strip

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface RenderOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [brightness?](./piixel.renderoptions.brightness.md) |  | number | _(Optional)_ Brightness of the LED strip (0.0 - 1.0) |
|  [pixels?](./piixel.renderoptions.pixels.md) |  | Uint32Array | _(Optional)_ Pixels to render to the LED strip |
